languages.text: "Смерть назвала имя... И мой разум не смог вместить волю Неумирающего. Шок погасил мысли, но в сердце осталась твердость, которой не хватило сознанию. Оно... просто остановилось. Исполнило то, что не смогла исполнить я своей рукой".

"Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."
languages.original_text: "Смерть назвала имя... И мой разум не смог вместить волю Неумирающего. Шок погасил мысли, но в сердце осталась твердость, которой не хватило сознанию. Оно... просто остановилось. Исполнило то, что не смогла исполнить я своей рукой".

"Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

languages.text: «La muerte pronunció el nombre... y mi mente no supo aceptar la voluntad del Inmortal. La impresión anuló todos mis pensamientos, pero mi corazón tenía una coraza de la que mi conciencia carecía. Se... detuvo, sin más. Hizo lo que yo fui incapaz de hacer por mi propia mano».
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte pronunció el nombre... y mi mente no supo aceptar la voluntad del Inmortal. La impresión anuló todos mis pensamientos, pero mi corazón tenía una coraza de la que mi conciencia carecía. Se... detuvo, sin más. Hizo lo que yo fui incapaz de hacer por mi propia mano».

languages.text: 「死がその名を呼んだ…そして私の心は不死の者の意志を受け入れることができなかった。ショックはすべての思考を消し去ったが、私の心には、私の意識にはない硬さが残っていた。それは…単に止まった。私が自分の手でできなかったことをしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

traits.locale_text: 「死がその名を呼んだ…そして私の心は不死の者の意志を受け入れることができなかった。ショックはすべての思考を消し去ったが、私の心には、私の意識にはない硬さが残っていた。それは…単に止まった。私が自分の手でできなかったことをしたのだ」

languages.text: “死亡呼唤了那个名字……而我的意识没能接受不死之神的意志。震惊之情泯灭了我所有思想，但即便如此，我的心也依然坚如磐石。我……不再思考，最终做到了靠自己的双手根本做不到的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

traits.locale_text: “死亡呼唤了那个名字……而我的意识没能接受不死之神的意志。震惊之情泯灭了我所有思想，但即便如此，我的心也依然坚如磐石。我……不再思考，最终做到了靠自己的双手根本做不到的事情。”

languages.text: "Der Tod rief den Namen ... und mein Verstand konnte den Willen des Todlosen nicht erfassen. Der Schock löschte jeden Gedanken aus, aber in meinem Herzen blieb eine Härte zurück, an der es meinem Bewusstsein mangelte. Es ... hat einfach aufgehört. Ich tat, was ich mit meiner eigenen Hand nicht tun konnte."
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tod rief den Namen ... und mein Verstand konnte den Willen des Todlosen nicht erfassen. Der Schock löschte jeden Gedanken aus, aber in meinem Herzen blieb eine Härte zurück, an der es meinem Bewusstsein mangelte. Es ... hat einfach aufgehört. Ich tat, was ich mit meiner eigenen Hand nicht tun konnte."

languages.text: « La mort a prononcé le nom… et mon esprit a tout simplement refusé la volonté de l'Immortel. Sous la force du choc, toutes mes pensées se sont envolées. C'est mon cœur qui a fait preuve de la dureté dont ma conscience était visiblement dépourvue. Il a tout simplement… cessé de battre. Il a fait ce que j'ai été incapable de faire de ma propre main. »
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."

traits.locale_text: « La mort a prononcé le nom… et mon esprit a tout simplement refusé la volonté de l'Immortel. Sous la force du choc, toutes mes pensées se sont envolées. C'est mon cœur qui a fait preuve de la dureté dont ma conscience était visiblement dépourvue. Il a tout simplement… cessé de battre. Il a fait ce que j'ai été incapable de faire de ma propre main. »

languages.text: "Ölüm benim ismimi söyledi... Zihnimse Ölmeyen'in arzusunu kabullenemedi. Şaşkınlığım tüm düşüncelerimi bastırsa da vicdanımda yoksun olan kasvet, kalbimde kalakaldı. Kalbim... Sadece durdu. Kendi elimle yapamadığım şeyi yaptı."
languages.original_text: "Death called the name... and my mind could not take in the will of the Undying One. The shock extinguished all thought, but there remained a hardness in my heart that my consciousness lacked. It... simply stopped. It did what I could not do by my own hand."
